sqlMap.select: SELECT id, flow_key, business_id, flow_node, approval_action, opinion, json_data, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_time, update_user_id, update_time, deleted FROM qm_approval_data where flow_key=#flowKey# and business_id=#businessId# and flow_node=#flowNode#

SELECT id, flow_key, business_id, flow_node, approval_action, opinion, json_data, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_time, update_user_id, update_time, deleted FROM qm_approval_data where id=#id#
sqlMap.update: update qm_approval_data set approval_action=#approvalAction#, opinion=#opinion#, json_data=#jsonData#, update_user_id=#updateUserId#, update_time=#updateTime# where id=#id#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO qm_approval_data (id, flow_key, business_id, flow_node, approval_action, opinion, json_data, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_time,update_user_id,update_time, deleted) VALUES(#id#, #flowKey#, #businessId#, #flowNode#, #approvalAction#, #opinion#, #jsonData#, #createUserId#, #createUserName#, #createTime#,#updateUserId# ,#updateTime# ,#deleted#)
sqlMap.select: select id, flow_key, business_id, flow_node, approval_action, opinion, json_data, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_time, update_user_id, update_time, deleted from qm_approval_data where deleted='0' and flow_key=#flowKey# and business_id=#businessId#
